thread.title: 6 things to do on a budget in Las Vegas — PHOTOS
thread.title_full: 6 things to do on a budget in Las Vegas — PHOTOS | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: John Przybys
title: 6 things to do on a budget in Las Vegas — PHOTOS
text:
Sure, you always hear about all the pricey stuff — concerts and shows and such — that have become synonymous with Las Vegas-style entertainment.
But locals know that more affordable entertainment treasures are scattered all over the valley. Some are cheap, some are absolutely free, but all offer savvy fun seekers a great afternoon or evening of entertainment.
Here are a few low-cost options to consider when spending even one more minute at home loses its appeal.
